import React, {useState} from 'react' import WarningIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Warning'; import Task from '@material-ui/icons/FormatListBulleted'; import Person from '@material-ui/icons/Person'; import Info from '@material-ui/icons/Info'; import LogOut from '@material-ui/icons/ExitToApp'; import SupervisedUserCircleIcon from '@material-ui/icons/SupervisedUserCircle'; import { Avatar, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import './header.css'; function Header() { const [checked, setChecked] = useState(true); return (

Task Management

{ setChecked(!checked); if(checked) document.getElementById("info").style.display="block"; if(!checked) document.getElementById("info").style.display="none" }}>
) } export default Header
